SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository

Interface CartRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
CartRepositoryImpl
public interface CartRepository
CartRepository is an interface for managing shopping cart data including retrieving, updating, and deleting cart information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    addCart(ShoppingCartDTO cart)
    Adds a new shopping cart entry.

    Deletes the shopping cart upon checkout.

    Deletes a specific transaction from the shopping cart.

    Retrieves a shopping cart by the user's unique identifier (UID).

    Finds the unique cart identifier (CID) based on the user's UID.

  • Method Details

    • findDocByUID

      com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot findDocByUID(String uid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the document snapshot of a shopping cart by the user's unique identifier (UID).
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      a DocumentSnapshot representing the user's shopping cart document
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findByUID

      ShoppingCartDTO findByUID(String uid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a shopping cart by the user's unique identifier (UID).
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      a ShoppingCartDTO containing the user's shopping cart details
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findCIDByUID

      String findCIDByUID(String uid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds the unique cart identifier (CID) based on the user's UID.
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the cart identifier (CID) as a String
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • updateCartWithOrder

      void updateCartWithOrder(String cid, String tid, int quantity, double newPrice) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates the shopping cart with a specific order, modifying quantity and price for a specified transaction.
      Parameters:
      cid - the cart identifier
      tid - the transaction identifier
      quantity - the new quantity of the item in the cart
      newPrice - the updated price for the item in the cart
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • addCart

      void addCart(ShoppingCartDTO cart)
      Adds a new shopping cart entry.
      Parameters:
      cart - a ShoppingCartDTO containing the details of the shopping cart to add

    • updateCartPrice

      void updateCartPrice(String cid, double price) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates the total price of the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      cid - the cart identifier
      price - the new total price of the cart
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • deleteTransaction

      void deleteTransaction(String cid, String tid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Deletes a specific transaction from the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      cid - the cart identifier
      tid - the transaction to be removed
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • deleteCartOnCheckout

      void deleteCartOnCheckout(String cid)
      Deletes the shopping cart upon checkout.
